ResourceHeader.ResourceName: INT-AUR MEMO MEDOR N2 : AC E and B waves (50 Hz - 240 kHz) Low Resolution
ResourceHeader.Description:
This data set contains non continuous low resolution calibrated wave form of the AC electric and magnetic fields in several frequency bands (50 Hz up to 240 kHz) from the MEMO MEDOR instrument of the Interball-Auroral probe.
A calibration file has been applied to calculate the data in physical value. The data have been transformed in physical value using in first the fourier transform and second the calibration in amplitude and phase coefficient has been applied. An inverse fourier transform is performed again to calculate the waveform in physical value.

Parameter.Name: AC E waves (50 Hz - 240 kHz) Low Resolution
Parameter.Description: INT-AUR MEMO MEDOR calibrated data of the electric field in three directions Low Resolution

Parameter.Name: AC B waves (50 Hz - 240 kHz) Low Resolution
Parameter.Description: INT-AUR MEMO MEDOR calibrated data of the magnetic field in three directions Low Resolution
